name: Camayak Content API Shopify Integration
description: A Node.js app for publishing to Shopify from Camayak.

shopifyAPIkey.description: The API key generated by Shopify.

shopifyPassword.description: The password for the API key genderated by Shopify.

shopifyBlogID.description: The ID of the blog that you would like Camayak to connect to.

shopifyBlogURL.description: The URL to the specific blog page on Shopify you would like Camayak to connect to.

camayak_api_key.description: The API key generated by Camayak.

camayak_shared_secret.description: A shared secret for signing Camayak requests.
